name: Rift Tactics
description:
You play as a Rift Keeper in a last stand against the overwhelming Jelly Army. You are the only Keeper left against and have to find a way to turn the tides in a losing battle.

Instructions:

The game has 3 fazes:

1. Keeper Moves

Click your characters to move them. You can attack and destroy a Jelly but your character will not survive.

2. Jelly Moves and attack 

The Jelly tries to move to a Keeper.  If it starts next to one it  will prepare to attack next turn.

3. Duplicate an area

Select a 3x3 grid to copy to a space next to it. It will replace everything in that area with its contents. (Bug: This is not displayed properly but shows up after you place it.) 

Clear all Jellys to win.

Good luck Rift Keeper.
